entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
